Name: Repealing licensure of operators of motion-picture projecting machines.
Title: A Local Law to repeal section 24-423 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the licensure of operators of motion-picture projecting machines
Summary: This bill would eliminate the requirement that a person must first secure a license from DCA before operating a motion picture projection machine.
Text:
Int. No. 1006-A
By Council Members Espinal, Johnson, Koslowitz, Gentile, Cohen, Levin, Kallos and Greenfield

..Title
A Local Law to repeal section 24-423 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the licensure of operators of motion-picture projecting machines 
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Section 24-423 of chapter 4 of title 24 of the administrative code of the city of New York is REPEALED. 
	ï¿½2. This local law takes effect immediately. 
	





LUR
LS# 5448
4/27/2016
